接口 AdminMapper


  • @Mapper
public interface AdminMapper

    • 方法详细资料

      • reg

        @Insert(value="insert into administrator(Administrator_Id,Administrator_account,Administrator_Name,Administrator_Pwd,Administrator_email,Administrator_telephone  ,Administrator_createTime,state) values(#{Administrator_id},#{Administrator_Account},#{Administrator_name},#{Administrator_pwd},#{Administrator_email},#{Administrator_telephone},#{Administrator_createTime},#{state})")
void reg(Administrator administrator)
        用于添加教师用户
        参数:
        administrator -

      • getMaxAdminId

        @Select(value="select IFNULL(max(Administrator_Id),0) from administrator")
java.lang.Integer getMaxAdminId()

      • getAdminByAdminAccount

        @Select(value="select Administrator_id,Administrator_Account,Administrator_name,Administrator_pwd,Administrator_email,Administrator_telephone,Administrator_createTime,state from administrator where administrator_Account = #{aminAccount}")
Administrator getAdminByAdminAccount(java.lang.String aminAccount)

      • updateState

        @Update(value="update administrator set state = 999 where Administrator_id = #{adminId}")
void updateState(int adminId)

      • updateMyPwd

        @Update(value="update administrator set Administrator_pwd = #{newPwd} where Administrator_id = #{adminId}")
void updateMyPwd(java.lang.String newPwd,
                                                                                                                              int adminId)

      • updateMyInfo

        @Update(value="update administrator set Administrator_email = #{email},Administrator_telephone = #{telephoto} where Administrator_id = #{adminId}")
void updateMyInfo(java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String telephoto,
                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String introduce,
                                                                                                                                                                       int adminId)

      • getAdminCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from administrator")
int getAdminCount()

      • getAllAdminInfo

        @Select(value="select Administrator_id as adminId,Administrator_account as adminAccount,Administrator_name as adminName,Administrator_email as adminEmail,Administrator_telephone as adminTelephoto,Administrator_createtime as adminCreateTime,state from administrator limit #{offset},#{size}")
java.util.List<AdminInfo> getAllAdminInfo(int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              int size)

      • changeTeacherInfo

        @Update(value="update administrator set Administrator_name = #{Administrator_name},Administrator_email = #{Administrator_email},Administrator_telephone = #{Administrator_telephone} where Administrator_Id = #{Administrator_id}")
void changeTeacherInfo(AdminInfo adminInfo)

      • getAdminByAdminId

        @Select(value="select Administrator_id as adminId,Administrator_account as adminAccount,Administrator_name as adminName,Administrator_email as adminEmail,Administrator_telephone as adminTelephoto,Administrator_createtime as adminCreateTime,state from administrator where Administrator_id = #{adminId}")
AdminInfo getAdminByAdminId(int adminId)
